name: Cybernetic Eye, Active Infrared (TL-10)
description:
The active infrared cybernetic eye can detect objects illuminated by infrared light (NIF visual bands), typically from a forehead-mounted infrared lamp. The eye has a range of 60 meters, but will not penetrate smoke, dense fog, blowing sand, etc. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
